properties.name: assetPaths
properties.defaultValue:
new Map([
    ['group', ASSET_PATH.DEFAULT],
    ['dynamicGroup', ASSET_PATH.DEFAULT],
    ['asset', ASSET_PATH.DEFAULT],
    ['device', ASSET_PATH.DEVICE],
    ['other', ASSET_PATH.DEVICE]
  ])
properties.description: A mapping of managed object types to their corresponding asset path.
properties.rawdescription: A mapping of managed object types to their corresponding asset path.

properties.name: icons

methods.name: getAssetPath
methods.rawdescription: Retrieves the path associated with a given managed object.
methods.description: Retrieves the path associated with a given managed object.

jsdoctags.comment: The managed object for which the asset path is to be retrieved.
The path associated with the managed object's type.

methods.name: getIcon
methods.rawdescription:
Finds an icon based on the contents of a managed object.
It takes into account factors such as type, and specific fragments.
methods.description: Finds an icon based on the contents of a managed object. It takes into account factors such as type, and specific fragments.

jsdoctags.comment: Managed object to be checked.
Determines whether the method should return an alternative icon showing the open state.
If no icon is found, this icon is returned.
Returns an icon.

methods.name: isAnyGroup
methods.rawdescription:
Checks whether the object belongs to any type of group.
Types of groups: group, dynamic group, data broker, data broker active.
methods.description: Checks whether the object belongs to any type of group. Types of groups: group, dynamic group, data broker, data broker active.

jsdoctags.comment: Managed object to be checked.
Returns true if the managed object belongs to the group category.

methods.name: isAsset
methods.rawdescription: Checks whether a given managed object is an asset.
methods.description: Checks whether a given managed object is an asset.

jsdoctags.comment: Managed object to be checked.
Returns true if the managed object is an asset.

methods.name: isDataBroker
methods.rawdescription: Checks whether a given managed object is a data broker.
methods.description: Checks whether a given managed object is a data broker.

jsdoctags.comment: Managed object to be checked.
Returns true if the managed object is a data broker.

methods.name: isDataBrokerActive
methods.rawdescription: Checks whether a given managed object is a data broker active.
methods.description: Checks whether a given managed object is a data broker active.

jsdoctags.comment: Managed object to be checked.
Returns true if the managed object is a data broker active.

methods.name: isDevice
methods.rawdescription: Checks whether a given managed object is a device.
methods.description: Checks whether a given managed object is a device.

jsdoctags.comment: Managed object to be checked.
Returns true if the managed object is a device.

methods.name: isDynamicGroup
methods.rawdescription: Checks whether a given managed object is a dynamic group.
methods.description: Checks whether a given managed object is a dynamic group.

jsdoctags.comment: Managed object to be checked.
Returns true if the managed object is a dynamic group.

methods.name: isGroup
methods.rawdescription: Checks whether a given managed object is a group.
methods.description: Checks whether a given managed object is a group.

jsdoctags.comment: Managed object to be checked.
Returns true if the managed object is a group.
